entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tracadie-Sheila
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
